body.p:
runs on any of the following operating systems:
Windows 7
Windows 8
Windows 8.1
Windows 10
To use with Shared Translation Memories stored on a LAN-server (Local Area Network) environment, the appropriate LAN-server incl. the appropriate software is required.
To use with Shared Translation Memories stored on a WEB-server, the WEB-server must be set up. That is mainly the relational DB such as MariaDB or MySQL.
To use with Shared Translation Memories stored on a WEB-server, a JRE (Java Runtime Environment) must be installed on the server. We recommend JRE v1.7 or above.
